meanings.definition: The art or process of creating holograms.
meanings.sent2: I saw a holography of a butterfly at the science museum.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved holography to make objects appear and disappear.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a holography, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The holography of the city skyline was so realistic, it felt like you could touch the buildings.

meanings.sent1: The company used holography on their product packaging for security.
meanings.sent2: When I moved, the holography on my credit card changed colors.
meanings.sent3: The cat was fascinated by the holography on the shiny surface.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed like a holography, creating an illusion of truth.
meanings.sent5: The holography of the singer on stage was so lifelike, it felt like she was really there.
